head.title: select all
head.description: select all is a new publishing model that supports the entire process from market strategy planning to execution based on the potential of games. It fosters mutual growth for developers and publishers through strategic partnerships with promising games.

heading.default:
Discover the
full potential of
every game

Discover the
full potential of every game

textboxTwo.default:
Every game holds
a seed of success.
We analyze its potential
through data-driven
insights to unlock
even greater outcomes.
We are a new kind of
publishing brand,
built for what's next.
